name: Sarwar
text: Ta. Sin. These are the verses of the Quran and of the illustrious Book

name: Sarwar
text: They are glad news and guidance for the believers

name: Sarwar
text: who are steadfast in prayer, who pay the religious tax, and who have strong faith in the life hereafter.

name: Sarwar
text: We have made the deeds of those who do not believe in the life to come, attractive to them and they wander about blindly.

name: Sarwar
text: They will suffer the worst kind of torment and will be lost in the life to come.

name: Sarwar
text: (Muhammad), you have certainly received the Quran from the All-wise and All-knowing One.

name: Sarwar
text: Moses said to his family, "I have seen some fire. I shall bring you some news about it or some fire so that you can warmyourselves".

name: Sarwar
text: When he approached the fire, he was told, "Blessed is the one in the fire and those around it. All glory belongs to God, the Lord of the Universe.

name: Sarwar
text: Moses, I am God, the Majestic and All-wise.

name: Sarwar
text: Throw down your staff." When Moses saw his staff on the ground moving like a living creature, he stepped back and did not come forward again. The Lord said,"Moses, do not be afraid. Messengers do not become afraid in My presence".

name: Sarwar
text: Only the unjust become afraid in My presence. Even to these people who replace their bad deeds by good ones, I am All-forgiving and All-merciful.

name: Sarwar
text: Put your hand into your pocket. It will come out sheer white but unharmed. This is one of the nine miracles which shall be showing to the Pharaoh and his people; they are truly wicked men."

name: Sarwar
text: When Our miracles were visibly shown to them, they said, "It is plain magic".

name: Sarwar
text: They rejected the evidence because of their arrogance and injustice, although their souls knew it to be true. Think how terrible the end of the sinful ones was!

name: Sarwar
text: We gave knowledge to David and Soloman. They said, "It is only God who deserves all praise. He has exalted us above many of His believing servants."

name: Sarwar
text: Solomon became the heir to David. He said, "People, we have been taught the language of the birds and have been granted a share of everything. This indeed is a manifest favor (from God)".

name: Sarwar
text: Soloman's army, consisting of human beings, jinn, and birds were gathered together in his presence in ranks.

name: Sarwar
text: When they arrived in the valley of the ants, one ant said to the others, "Enter your dwellings lest you be carelessly crushed by Soloman and his army."

name: Sarwar
text: (Solomon) smiled at the ant's remarks and said, "Lord, inspire me to thank you for Your favors to me and my parents and to act righteously so as to please you. Admit me, by your mercy into the company of Your righteous servants".

name: Sarwar
text: (Solomon) inspected the birds and said, "How is it that I cannot see the hoopoe. Is he absent?

name: Sarwar
text: I shall certainly punish him severely or slaughter him unless he has a good reason for his absence."

name: Sarwar
text: Not long after the hoopoe came forward and said, "I have information which you do not have. I have come from the land of Sheba with a true report.

name: Sarwar
text: I found a woman ruling the people there and she possessed something of (almost) everything and a great throne.

name: Sarwar
text: I found her and her people prostrating before the sun instead of God. Satan has made their deeds attractive to them. He has kept them away from the right path and they have no guidance.

name: Sarwar
text: (Satan has done this) so that they will not worship God who brings forth whatever is hidden in the heavens and the earth and knows whatever you conceal or reveal.

name: Sarwar
text: God is the only Lord and master of the Great Throne."

name: Sarwar
text: Solomon said, "We shall see whether you are truthful or a liar.

name: Sarwar
text: Take this letter of mine and deliver it to them, then return and see what their reply will be."

name: Sarwar
text: (The Queen of Sheba) said to her officials, "A gracious letter has been dropped before me.

name: Sarwar
text: It reads, 'From Soloman. In the Name of God, the Beneficent and the Merciful.

name: Sarwar
text: Do not consider yourselves superior to me but come to me as Muslims (in submission)".

name: Sarwar
text: She said, "My officials, what are your views on this matter? I will not decide until I have your views.

name: Sarwar
text: They replied, "We have great power and valor. You are the commander, so decide as you like".

name: Sarwar
text: She said, "When Kings enter a town they destroy it and disrespect its honorable people. That is what they will do, too.

name: Sarwar
text: I will send a gift and we shall see what response the Messengers will bring."

name: Sarwar
text: When her Messengers came to Soloman, he said, "Have you brought me wealth? What God has given to me is far better than what He has given to you, but you are happy with your gifts.

name: Sarwar
text: Go back to your people and we shall soon come there with an army which they will not be able to face. We shall drive them from their town, humble, and disgraced."

name: Sarwar
text: Solomon asked his people, "Who among you can bring her throne before (she, the queen of Sheba) comes to me submissively?"

name: Sarwar
text: A monstrous jinn said, "I can bring it before you even stand up. I am powerful and trustworthy".

name: Sarwar
text: The one who had knowledge from the Book said, "I can bring it to you before you even blink your eye." When Solomon saw the throne placed before him, he said, "This is a favor from my Lord by which He wants to test whether I am grateful or ungrateful. Whoever thanks God does so for his own good. Whoever is ungrateful to God should know that my Lord is Self-Sufficient and Benevolent."

name: Sarwar
text: Then he said, "Make a few changes to her throne and let us see whether she will recognize it or not."

name: Sarwar
text: When she came she was asked, "Is your throne like this?" She replied, "It seems that this is it. We had received the knowledge before this and were submissive (to Solomon's power)".

name: Sarwar
text: Her idols prevented her from believing in God and she was an infidel.

name: Sarwar
text: She was told to enter the palace. When she saw it, she thought that it was a pool and raised her clothe up to her legs. Solomon said, "This is a palace constructed with glass." She said, "My Lord, indeed I have wronged myself and I submit myself with Solomon to the will of God, the Lord of the Universe."

name: Sarwar
text: We sent to the tribe of Thamud their brother Salih so that they would worship God, but they became two quarrelling groups.

name: Sarwar
text: Salih said, "My people, why do you commit sins so quickly before doing good? Would that you ask forgiveness from God so that perhaps He will have mercy upon you."

name: Sarwar
text: They said, "We have an ill omen about you and your followers." Salih replied, God has made your ill fortune await you. You are a people on trial."

name: Sarwar
text: There were nine tribes in the city spreading evil without any reform in the land.

name: Sarwar
text: They said, "Let us swear by God to do away with him and his family during the night then tell his guardian that we did not see how he and his family had been destroyed, and we shall be telling the truth."

name: Sarwar
text: They plotted and We planned without their knowledge. Consider the result of their plot.

name: Sarwar
text: We destroyed them and their people altogether.

name: Sarwar
text: Those are their empty houses which We ruined because of their injustice. In this there is evidence (of the truth) for the people of knowledge.

name: Sarwar
text: We saved the faithful God-fearing believers.

name: Sarwar
text: Lot asked his people, "Do you understandably commit indecency?

name: Sarwar
text: Do you have carnal relations with men rather than women? You are ignorant people".

name: Sarwar
text: His people had no answer but to say, "Expel Lot and his family from the town for they want to be pure."

name: Sarwar
text: We saved (Lot) and his family except his wife who was destined to remain behind.

name: Sarwar
text: We sent to them a terrible rainstorm. How horrible was the rain for the people who had already received warning.

name: Sarwar
text: (Muhammad), say, "It is only God who deserves all praise. Peace be upon His chosen servants. Which is better God or the idols?

name: Sarwar
text: "(Are the idols worthier or) the One who has created the heavens and the earth, who has sent water from the sky for you, who has established delightful gardens and you could not even plant one tree? Is there any Lord besides God? In fact, the unbelievers are the ones who deviate from the right path.

name: Sarwar
text: "(Are the idols worthier or) the One who has made the earth a resting place, the rivers flow from its valleys, the mountains as anchors and a barrier between the two seas? Is there any lord besides God? In fact, most people do not know.

name: Sarwar
text: "(Are the idols worthier or) the One who answers the prayers of the distressed ones, removes their hardship, and makes you the successors in the land? Is there any lord besides God? In fact, you take very little heed.

name: Sarwar
text: "(Are the idols worthier or) the One who guides you in the darkness of the land and sea and sends the winds bearing the glad news of His mercy? Is there any lord besides God? God is too exalted to be considered equal to anything else.

name: Sarwar
text: "(Are the idols worthier or) the One who began the creation and who will turn it back, who gives you sustenance from the heavens and the earth? Is there any lord besides God? Say, "Bring your proof if what you say is true."

name: Sarwar
text: (Muhammad) say, "No one in the heavens or the earth knows the unseen except God, and no one knows when they will be resurrected.

name: Sarwar
text: Their knowledge of the next life is no more than doubts. In fact, they are blind about it.

name: Sarwar
text: The unbelievers have said, "Shall we and our fathers be brought out of the graves after we become dust?

name: Sarwar
text: It was promised to us and to our fathers before us. It is only ancient legends."

name: Sarwar
text: Say, "Travel through the land and see how terrible was the end of the criminal ones".

name: Sarwar
text: (Muhammad), do not be grieved (about their disbelief) nor distressed about their evil plans against you.

name: Sarwar
text: They ask, "When the Day of Judgment will come, if it is true at all?"

name: Sarwar
text: Say, "Perhaps some of the things which you wish to experience immediately are very close to you."

name: Sarwar
text: Your Lord has many favors for mankind but most of them are ungrateful.

name: Sarwar
text: Your Lord certainly knows whatever their hearts conceal or reveal.

name: Sarwar
text: All the secrets in heavens and earth are recorded in the illustrious Book.

name: Sarwar
text: This Quran tells the Israelites most of the matters about which they had disputes among themselves.

name: Sarwar
text: It is a guide and mercy for the believers.

name: Sarwar
text: Your Lord will judge among them according to His own decree. He is Majestic and All-Knowing.

name: Sarwar
text: Trust in God for you follow the manifest truth.

name: Sarwar
text: You cannot make the dead listen and the deaf are unable to hear calls. Thus, they turn back on their heels.

name: Sarwar
text: You cannot guide the straying blind ones. You can only make hear those who believe in Our revelations submissively.

name: Sarwar
text: When the word about them comes true We shall make a creature appear to them on earth who will tell them that people had no faith in Our revelations.

name: Sarwar
text: On the day when We resurrect from every nation a group from among those who had rejected Our revelations, they will be kept confined in ranks.

name: Sarwar
text: When they will be brought into the presence of God, He will ask them, "Did you reject My revelations without fully understanding them. What did you know about them if you had any knowledge at all?

name: Sarwar
text: They will become subject to punishment because of their injustice. Thus, they will not speak.

name: Sarwar
text: Have they not seen that We have created the night for them to rest and the day for them to see. In this there is evidence for the believing people.

name: Sarwar
text: Everyone in the heavens and earth will be terrified on the day when the trumpet will be sounded except those whom God will save. Everyone will humbly come into the presence of God.

name: Sarwar
text: You think the mountains are solid. In fact, they move like clouds. It is God's technique which has established everything perfectly. He is well Aware of what you do.

name: Sarwar
text: Whoever does a good deed will receive a better reward than what he has done. He will be secure from the terror of the Day of Judgment.

name: Sarwar
text: Those who commit evil will be thrown headlong into hell fire. (It will be said to them) can you expect any recompense other than what you deserve for your deeds?

name: Sarwar
text: I am commanded to worship the Lord of this town which He has made sacred. To Him belong all things. I am commanded to be a Muslim

name: Sarwar
text: and recite the Quran. Whoever seeks guidance will find it for his own soul. Say to whoever goes astray, "I am only a warner".

name: Sarwar
text: Say, "It is only He who deserves all praise. He will soon show you His signs and you will recognize them. Your Lord is not unaware of what you do.
